title: Newcastle Coders Group: Ice Cream and French Fries with Cheese (a.k.a. Office 365 development and a dash of Power BI) - Adam Cogan
thumbnailDescription: Newcastle Coders Group: Ice Cream and French Fries with Cheese (a.k.a. Office 365 development and a dash of Power BI) - Adam Cogan
eventShortDescription:
Newcastle Coders Group: Ice Cream and French Fries with Cheese (a.k.a. Office 365 development and a dash of Power BI) - Adam Cogan

The landscape of development for Office 365 and SharePoint 2016 has changed. Farm solutions and WSPs should be *deleted* from your vocabulary. If you do it right, you just need standard web technologies – but doing it right is only simple when you know the pros and cons of Angular, React, .NET Core, and we may as well throw DevOps in the mix as well. Come join Adam and hear what the landscape is today, so you can walk away with a solid foundation for widget and web part development.

About the presenter:

Adam Cogan is the Chief Architect at SSW, a Microsoft Certified Gold Partner specializing in custom .NET, SharePoint and CRM solutions (with a splash of Business Intelligence). At SSW, Adam has been developing custom solutions for businesses across a range of industries such as Government, engineering, banking, insurance and manufacturing since 1990 for clients such as Microsoft, Worley Parsons and Aurecon.​
